briefTitle: Does Endometrial Injury Improve Intrauterine Insemination Outcome?

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 - 38 years.
* patent fallopian tunes.
* mild male factor.
* anovulation.
* unexplained infertility.

Exclusion Criteria:

* indications for ICSI.
* evidence of pelvic inflammatory disease.

outcomeMeasures.title: Chemical Pregnancy Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Human chorionic gonadotrophin (b-hcg) detection in serum two weeks after intrauterine insemination.

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Pregnancy Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Ultrasound detection of an intrauterine positive fetal heart pulsations
